trans-unit.source: Represents the duration of time that a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> is active.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta l'intervallo di tempo durante cui un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> è attivo.

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso della sintassi XAML per gli attributi

trans-unit.source: \<*object* *property*="[*days*.]*hours*:*minutes*:*seconds*[.*fractionalSeconds*]"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*oggetto* *proprietà*= "[*giorni*.] *ore*:*minuti*:*secondi*[.* frazioni di secondo*] "/ >

trans-unit.source: \- or -
trans-unit.target: \- oppure -

trans-unit.source: \<*object* *property*="[*days*.]*hours*:*minutes*"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*oggetto* *proprietà*= "[*giorni*.] *ore*:*minuti*"/ >

trans-unit.source: \- or -
trans-unit.target: \- oppure -

trans-unit.source: \<*object* *property*="<xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*object* *property*="<xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>"/>

trans-unit.source: \- or -
trans-unit.target: \- oppure -

trans-unit.source: \<*object* *property*="<xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*object* *property*="<xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>"/>

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: Valori XAML

trans-unit.source: *days*
trans-unit.target: *Giorni*

trans-unit.source: A value greater than or equal to 0 that describes the number of days spanned by this duration.
trans-unit.target: Un valore maggiore o uguale a 0, che descrive il numero di giorni inclusi nella durata.

trans-unit.source: *hours*
trans-unit.target: *Ore*

trans-unit.source: A value between 0 and 23 that represents the number of hours spanned by this duration.
trans-unit.target: Un valore compreso tra 0 e 23 che rappresenta il numero di ore occupate da questa durata.

trans-unit.source: *minutes*
trans-unit.target: *minuti*

trans-unit.source: A value between 0 and 59 that represents the number of minutes spanned by this duration.
trans-unit.target: Un valore compreso tra 0 e 59 che rappresenta il numero di minuti totali nella durata.

trans-unit.source: *seconds*
trans-unit.target: *Secondi*

trans-unit.source: A value between 0 and 59 that represents the number of seconds spanned by this duration
trans-unit.target: Un valore compreso tra 0 e 59 che rappresenta il numero di secondi occupati da questa durata

trans-unit.source: *fractionalSeconds*
trans-unit.target: *fractionalSeconds*

trans-unit.source: A value consisting of 1 to 7 digits that represents fractional seconds.
trans-unit.target: Un valore composto da 1 a 7 cifre che rappresenta i secondi frazionari.

trans-unit.source: Represents the initial time interval of this duration.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta l'intervallo di tempo iniziale di questa durata.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> structure with the supplied <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della struttura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> con il valore <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <paramref name="timeSpan" /> is initialized to a negative value.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando <paramref name="timeSpan" /> viene inizializzato con un valore negativo.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> that represents the value of the current instance plus <c>duration</c>.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> che rappresenta il valore dell'istanza corrente più <c>duration</c>.

trans-unit.source: Adds the value of the specified instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to the value of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge il valore dell'istanza specificata di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> al valore dell'istanza corrente.

trans-unit.source: If both instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> have values, an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> that represents the combined values.
trans-unit.target: Se entrambe le istanze di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> dispongono di valori, un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> che rappresenta i valori combinati.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, questo metodo restituisce <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> value that is automatically determined.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> determinato automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> initialized to an automatic value.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> inizializzato su un valore automatico.

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso della sintassi XAML per gli attributi

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: Valori XAML

trans-unit.source: *property*
trans-unit.target: *proprietà*

trans-unit.source: A property that accepts a <xref:System.Windows.Duration> value.
trans-unit.target: Una proprietà che accetta un <xref:System.Windows.Duration> valore.

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Prima istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Seconda istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: Compares one <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> value to another.
trans-unit.target: Confronta un valore <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> con un altro.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="t1" /> is less than <paramref name="t2" />, a negative value that represents the difference.
trans-unit.target: Se <paramref name="t1" /> è minore di <paramref name="t2" />, un valore negativo che rappresenta la differenza.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="t1" /> is equal to <paramref name="t2" />, zero.
trans-unit.target: Se <paramref name="t1" /> è uguale a <paramref name="t2" />, zero.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="t1" /> is greater than <paramref name="t2" />, a positive value that represents the difference.
trans-unit.target: Se <paramref name="t1" /> è maggiore di <paramref name="t2" />, un valore positivo che rappresenta la differenza.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration> instances with a property value of <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> are a special case with the following return values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration> le istanze con un valore della proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> rappresentano un caso speciale con i valori restituiti seguenti.

trans-unit.source: If `t1` is Automatic and `t2` is not, -1 is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se `t1` sia impostato su automatico e `t2` è, non viene restituito -1.

trans-unit.source: If `t1` is Automatic and `t2` is also Automatic, 0 is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se `t1` sia impostato su automatico e `t2` è anche automatica, viene restituito 0.

trans-unit.source: If `t1` is not Automatic and `t2` is Automatic, 1 is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se `t1` non è automatica e `t2` sia impostato su automatico, viene restituito 1.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a specified object is equal to an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: Indica se un oggetto specificato è uguale a un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.

trans-unit.source: Object to check for equality.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto di cui verificare l'uguaglianza.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a specified object is equal to an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se un oggetto specificato è uguale a un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if value is equal to the current instance of Duration; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il valore è uguale all'istanza corrente di Duration; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to check for equality.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> di cui verificare l'uguaglianza.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> is equal to this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> specificato è uguale a un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="duration" /> is equal to the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="duration" /> è uguale all'istanza corrente di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: First instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Prima istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: Second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Seconda istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> are equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se due istanze di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="t1" /> is equal to <paramref name="t2" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="t1" /> è uguale a <paramref name="t2" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> value that represents an infinite interval.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> che rappresenta un intervallo infinito.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> initialized to a forever value.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> inizializzato con un valore infinito.

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso della sintassi XAML per gli attributi

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: Valori XAML

trans-unit.source: *property*
trans-unit.target: *proprietà*

trans-unit.source: A property that accepts a <xref:System.Windows.Duration> value.
trans-unit.target: Una proprietà che accetta un <xref:System.Windows.Duration> valore.

trans-unit.source: Gets a hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un codice hash per questa istanza.

trans-unit.source: A signed 32-bit integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: Codice hash di valori interi a 32 bit con segno.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates if this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> represents a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> rappresenta un valore <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />.

trans-unit.source: True if this Duration is a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> value; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: True se la durata è un valore <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />; in caso contrario, false.

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: Prima istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> da sommare.

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: Seconda istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> da sommare.

trans-unit.source: Adds two instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> together.
trans-unit.target: Somma due istanze di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.

trans-unit.source: If both instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> have <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> values, this method returns the sum of those two values.
trans-unit.target: Se entrambe le istanze di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> hanno valori <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />, questo metodo restituisce la somma di tali valori.

trans-unit.source: If either value is set to <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic" />, the method returns <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic" />.
trans-unit.target: Se uno dei due valori è impostato su <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic" />, il metodo restituisce <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic" />.

trans-unit.source: If either value is set to <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Forever" />, the method returns <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Forever" />.
trans-unit.target: Se uno dei due valori è impostato su <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Forever" />, il metodo restituisce <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Forever" />.

trans-unit.source: If either <paramref name="t1" /> or <paramref name="t2" /> has no value, this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Se <paramref name="t1" /> o <paramref name="t2" /> non ha alcun valore, il metodo restituisce <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Add%28System.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: Il metodo equivalente per l'operatore è <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Add%28System.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Prima istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Seconda istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> are equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se due istanze di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if both instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> have values and are equal, or if both instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> are <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se entrambe le istanze di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> hanno valori e sono uguali oppure se entrambe le istanze di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> sono <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, questo metodo restituisce <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Equals%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: Il metodo equivalente per l'operatore è <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Equals%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Prima istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Seconda istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: Determines if one instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> is greater than another.
trans-unit.target: Determina se un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> è maggiore di un'altra.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if both <paramref name="t1" /> and <paramref name="t2" /> have values and <paramref name="t1" /> is greater than <paramref name="t2" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se sia <paramref name="t1" /> che <paramref name="t2" /> hanno valori e <paramref name="t1" /> è maggiore di <paramref name="t2" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> is considered greater than any finite value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> viene considerato maggiore di qualsiasi valore finito.

trans-unit.source: Any comparison with an <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> value returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Qualsiasi confronto con un <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> valore restituisce `false`.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Compare%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: Il metodo equivalente per l'operatore è <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Compare%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Prima istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Seconda istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> is greater than or equal to another instance.
trans-unit.target: Determina se un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> è maggiore o uguale a un'altra istanza.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if both <paramref name="t1" /> and <paramref name="t2" /> have values and <paramref name="t1" /> is greater than or equal to <paramref name="t2" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se sia <paramref name="t1" /> che <paramref name="t2" /> hanno valori e <paramref name="t1" /> è maggiore o uguale a <paramref name="t2" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> is considered greater than any finite value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> viene considerato maggiore di qualsiasi valore finito.

trans-unit.source: Any comparison with an <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> value returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Qualsiasi confronto con un <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> valore restituisce `false`.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Compare%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: Il metodo equivalente per l'operatore è <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Compare%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> from which an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> is implicitly created.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> da cui viene creata in modo implicito un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.

trans-unit.source: Implicitly creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea in modo implicito un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> da un oggetto <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: Nuova istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Duration.%23ctor%28System.TimeSpan%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: Il metodo equivalente per l'operatore è <xref:System.Windows.Duration.%23ctor%28System.TimeSpan%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> is negative.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> è negativo.

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Prima istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Seconda istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: Determines if two instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se due istanze di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> non sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if exactly one of <paramref name="t1" /> or <paramref name="t2" /> represent a value, or if they both represent values that are not equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se un solo oggetto tra <paramref name="t1" /> e <paramref name="t2" /> rappresenta un valore o se entrambi rappresentano valori non uguali; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Compare%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: Il metodo equivalente per l'operatore è <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Compare%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Prima istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Seconda istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the value of one instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> is less than the value of another instance.
trans-unit.target: Determina se il valore di un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> è minore di quello di un'altra istanza.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if both <paramref name="t1" /> and <paramref name="t2" /> have values and <paramref name="t1" /> is less than <paramref name="t2" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se sia <paramref name="t1" /> che <paramref name="t2" /> hanno valori e <paramref name="t1" /> è minore di <paramref name="t2" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> is considered greater than any finite value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> viene considerato maggiore di qualsiasi valore finito.

trans-unit.source: Any comparison with an <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> value returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Qualsiasi confronto con un <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> valore restituisce `false`.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Compare%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: Il metodo equivalente per l'operatore è <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Compare%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Prima istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Seconda istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the value of one instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> is less than or equal to the value of another instance.
trans-unit.target: Determina se il valore di un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> è minore o uguale a quello di un'altra istanza.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if both <paramref name="t1" /> and <paramref name="t2" /> have values and <paramref name="t1" /> is less than or equal to <paramref name="t2" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se sia <paramref name="t1" /> che <paramref name="t2" /> hanno valori e <paramref name="t1" /> è minore o uguale a <paramref name="t2" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> is considered greater than any finite value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> viene considerato maggiore di qualsiasi valore finito.

trans-unit.source: Any comparison with an <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> value returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Qualsiasi confronto con un <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> valore restituisce `false`.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Compare%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: Il metodo equivalente per l'operatore è <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Compare%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: Prima istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.

trans-unit.source: The instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to subtract.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> da sottrarre.

trans-unit.source: Subtracts the value of one instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> from another.
trans-unit.target: Sottrae il valore di un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> da quello di un'altra istanza.

trans-unit.source: If both instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> have values, an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> that represents the value of <paramref name="t1" /> minus <paramref name="t2" />.
trans-unit.target: Se entrambe le istanze di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> dispongono di valori, un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> che rappresenta il valore di <paramref name="t1" /> meno <paramref name="t2" />.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="t1" /> has a value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Forever" /> and <paramref name="t2" /> has a value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.TimeSpan" />, this method returns <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Forever" />.
trans-unit.target: Se <paramref name="t1" /> ha un valore <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Forever" /> e <paramref name="t2" /> ha un valore <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.TimeSpan" />, questo metodo restituisce <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Forever" />.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, questo metodo restituisce <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The following calculations all return a value of <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>.
trans-unit.target: I calcoli seguenti restituiscono tutti un valore di <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> minus <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> meno <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.TimeSpan%2A> minus <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.TimeSpan%2A> meno <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.TimeSpan%2A> minus <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.TimeSpan%2A> meno <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> minus <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> meno <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> minus <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> meno <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> minus <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> meno <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> minus <xref:System.Windows.Duration.TimeSpan%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> meno <xref:System.Windows.Duration.TimeSpan%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Subtract%28System.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: Il metodo equivalente per l'operatore è <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Subtract%28System.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to get.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> da ottenere.

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'istanza specificata di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Plus%28System.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: Il metodo equivalente per l'operatore è <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Plus%28System.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to get.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> da ottenere.

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'istanza specificata di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.

trans-unit.source: The instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to subtract from the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> da sottrarre all'istanza corrente.

trans-unit.source: Subtracts the value of the specified instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> from this instance.
trans-unit.target: Sottrae il valore dell'istanza specificata di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> da questa istanza.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> whose value is the result of this instance minus the value of <paramref name="duration" />.
trans-unit.target: Nuova istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> il cui valore è il risultato del valore di questa istanza meno il valore di <paramref name="duration" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> value that this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore di <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> rappresentato da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> value that this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: Valore di <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> rappresentato da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs if <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica se <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> è <see langword="null" />:

trans-unit.source: Converts an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to a <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation.
trans-unit.target: Converte un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> in una rappresentazione <see cref="T:System.String" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: Rappresentazione <see cref="T:System.String" /> di questa istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
